pillars.title: Start from real workflows
pillars.body: Understand how work actually happens before shaping the product around it.

pillars.title: Design for clarity
pillars.body: Make states, responsibilities, and feedback loops obvious to the people using the system.

pillars.title: Build explainable tools
pillars.body: Favor systems where it’s always clear why something happened, not just what happened.

pillars.title: Iterate with structure
pillars.body: Use lightweight structure—checkpoints, experiments, and metrics—to guide change.

auroraPreview.heading: Aurora: Conversational Software, Not Just Tools
auroraPreview.body: Aurora is a conceptual approach to building software through conversation—intent, understanding, and result tied together with clarity and explanation. It influences how I design products to be transparent, explainable, and aligned with how people actually think.

aboutPreview.heading: About My Background
aboutPreview.body: My work sits at the intersection of systems and people. I’ve led teams, refined workflows, and independently built tools and platforms. That mix of operations and software shapes how I approach product decisions.
